Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: FIGHTING REPORTED ALONG COMBINE-GHOST BEAR BORDER! Outrach: Scattered reports of violence in the vicinity of the Ghost Bear Dominion capital world of Alshain have been confirmed, as as DCMS and Clan Ghost Bear forces have begun full mobilization. Early reports indicate that elements of the Alshain Avengers staged an assault on Ghost Bear forces in the system, although details are sketchy at best and the current status of the Avengers regiments and their destroyer, the Dragon’s Last Tear, is unknown. The Alshain Avengers are a DCMS unit formed from the remnants of the Alshain Regulars decimated during the Clan Invasion, but it is unknown whether the attack on Alshain was a rogue action or a sanctioned DCMS mission.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
BLAKISTS AGITATE FOR STAR LEAGUE REPRESENTATION!


Terra, Sol System: Representatives from the Word of Blake fundamentalist faction of ComStar have begun lobbying the Great Houses for representation in the 2nd Star League. According to a Blakist spokesperson “For too long the secularists have meddled with impunity in the affairs of the faithful. The Great Houses ignore  us at their peril, and the day may soon come that the voices of the Great Houses will fall silent.” Requests for comment from the Star League have been denied.
